name: interlay
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to put pieces of something between pieces of something else, usually carefully or for a particular purpose: The process involves interlaying very thin layers of silicon. Three slices of toasted bread were interlaid with pieces of chicken.
More examplesFewer examplesThis delicate pendant with interlaid cosmic symbols is subtle yet eye-catching.The three crosses are interlaid with silver and black.The fritters were interlaid with crisp curly kale.He studied the effect of interlaying irradiated fibres on the durability of carbon fibre composites.
